metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5213 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: In NetHack before 3.6.5, too long of a value for the SYMBOL configurationfile option can cause a buffer overflow resulting in a crash or remote codeexecution/privilege escalation. This vulnerability affects systems thathave NetHack installed suid/sgid and shared systems that allow users toupload their own configuration files. Users should upgrade to NetHack3.6.5.

criterions.comment: nethack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
